name: Accurate Exam Simulator
description:
Have you ever been in an exam and run out of enough space for whatever bullshit you are writing? This is an accurate simulation of that moment!

Oh and your writing hand has been broken! Enjoy your time.

Instruction:
Try to fill your paper as much as possible before running out of time by moving the paper. try not to cross what you've written to gain more score. The writing will speed up if you keep writing without a pause.
